name: Almost TOAST
description:
HalfSpinMuon presents...

A very simple counting game, with you at the helm of a mighty toaster.

Your TOASTER-9000 is broken! Oh no, it seems your super toaster's timer is shot, but you still need to sell toast to your loyal customers... if you... have any...

BUT THAT"S BESIDES THE POINT!

Just toast all the bread you can! Count down the time in your head, and press the spacebar when you are ready to retrieve your sacred carbohydrates.

Why are you toasting bread? No idea. What even is this? No idea. Is it fun? ...no idea

Have fun? It's really not that fun :)
